description: MobiPet is the ideal mobile application for all pet owners. Easily track and keep a running journal of your pets and their key information and needs. Add and manage as many pets as you need with MobiPet. Five main categories on the home screen will allow you to enter and access all vital and relevant information such as pet type, weight, dietary needs, medical information, calendar activities/reminders, vet info and appointments, emergency contact information and much more.  The Calendar/Activity Tracker integrates seamlessly into your phone's native calendar app to track vet visits, grooming appointments, dog walks, play dates with other animals, or any other important activities for Fido and Felix.  The General Information category allows you to record rabies id, registrations numbers, microchip information, weights as well as the ability to create your own custom tabs for recording unique information. Store and track all relevant 'contact' information for each pet. Easily export any and all pet information via email to your desired recipient. Sending information regarding your pet(s) to dog sitters, vet’s, groomers or anyone else has never been easier! Full integration with your phone's existing contacts makes all this a snap.  We all love our pets and with MobiPet, you can take them with you wherever your phone goes.
